mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game ( TEAM_KEY, GAME_DATE, GAME_LOCATION, GAME_TITLE, GAME_CONTENTS, GAME_FDATE, GAME_COMPLETE ) VALUES ( #{team_key}, now(), #{game_location}, #{game_title}, #{game_contents}, #{game_fdate}, 0 );
mapper.select:
select GAME_KEY ,TEAM_KEY ,GAME_DATE ,GAME_LOCATION ,GAME_TITLE ,GAME_CONTENTS ,GAME_FDATE ,GAME_COMPLETE ,rnum ,(select TEAM_NAME from team B where B.TEAM_KEY =A.TEAM_KEY) as TEAM_NAME from ( select A.GAME_KEY ,A.TEAM_KEY ,A.GAME_DATE ,A.GAME_LOCATION ,A.GAME_TITLE ,A.GAME_CONTENTS ,A.GAME_FDATE ,A.GAME_COMPLETE
,@rownum := @rownum+1 AS rnum from game A, (select @rownum:=0) B
where GAME_TITLE like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%')
where GAME_CONTENTS like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%')
where GAME_TITLE like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%') or GAME_CONTENTS like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%')
order by GAME_KEY desc ) A limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

select A.GAME_KEY ,A.TEAM_KEY ,A.GAME_DATE ,A.GAME_LOCATION ,A.GAME_TITLE ,A.GAME_CONTENTS ,A.GAME_FDATE ,A.GAME_COMPLETE
FROM game A where GAME_KEY = #{game_key};

select count(*) from game
where GAME_TITLE like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%')
where GAME_CONTENTS like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%')
where GAME_TITLE like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%') or GAME_CONTENTS like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%')
select team_city,team_key,team_name from team where team_key = (select team_key from membership where user_key = #{user_key})
select A.user_key from membership A where A.team_key = #{team_key} AND A.membership_role = 1;
